content:
Here is a website with python plotting examples:

https://geocat-examples.readthedocs.io/en/latest/gallery/index.html

These are meant to mimic the available NCL plotting examples found here:

https://www.ncl.ucar.edu/gallery.shtml

More examples showing deeper data analysis workflows and plots can be found here:

https://github.com/NCAR/notebook-gallery/blob/master/README.md
